reviews.review: Its fun, but I would reccomend counter strike: Source only because of the weapons.
Died. Shot some b*****s in the head. Got killed again. Raged. 10/10 would shoot some b*****s again.

I like this game soo much
Polecam Grę Counter-Strike Global Offensive ponieważ jest bardzo ciekawa

Bu oyunu almadan öncesi ve sonrası diye bakıyorum dünyaya.Ve de CS:GO ile tüm FPS oyunlarındaki başarım değişti.Oyuncu profilim değişti.İndirimleri beklemeye gerek yok.Zaten son zamanlarda indirime pek girmiyor,en fazla 16TL'ye düşüyor.

Si no sos toxico y le dedicas mucho tiempo al juego para ser un mejor jugador no hay nada mejor que cs go, en cambio si sos un jugador casual, te aseguro que no te va a atraer para nada.
En torno a la comunidad (para mi) es muy llevadera si te tomas todo lo que dicen a chiste, hice muchos amigos iniciando una conversacion a base de insultos (conscientemente de que no hablabamos enserio).

Very good game. 10/5. Like Call of Battlefield Duty 1 Warfare but better.
I have a lot of fun playing this game with friends or with randoms. Great skill and strategie based FPS.

There are multiple sides to this game and like every game, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive has positives and negatives. But first of all i want to tell you; [b]This game is awesome![/b]

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is not like any other First-Person Shooter out there.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
   [*] You never get bored of it
   [*] Extremely well-made maps
   [*] A lot of customizable stuff (hud, crosshair, viewmodel, etc. )
   [*] Great matchmaking system
   [*] Skins are awesome
   [*] Easy to learn, hard to master
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
   [*] The VAC system is a total failure
   [*] A lot of bugs is still in the game, and is never fixed
   [*] The game is full of cheaters and griefers
   [*] Unbalanced guns
[/list]

Even if the cheaters, russians(sorry), griefers and other horrible things still exists, I love the game and I will never stop playing it!
